description: The Clockmaker is an old man who owns a shop in the clock tower of the town of http://anidb.net/ch26018 [Guri]. http://anidb.net/ch14480 [Kana] works as his apprentice; he is strict with Kana because he sees potential in her. Kana addresses him as oyakata (親方 =master).
name: Tokeiya no Oyaji
